column4: hi, can anyone tell me why under system->administration on my Fiesty install I cannot see "login window"? How can I get it back or open it manually?
do you mean a terminal window?
Applications>Accessories>Terminal
no its a setting windows for the gdm login... gives options like automatically logging in a user
I havent ever seen that on my menu...noly ever seen access to thpse configs in kubuntu menu
its there in my gutsy... its also in the Feisty faqs etc : (
I'd take a screen shot... but please just trust me it is : )
i trust you it just isnt on my menus never has been
it is on my kde menu though under system settings
http://www.simplehelp.net/images/ubuntulogin/ubal01.jpg
just a google image search, not mine
its probably because I dont use gdm i use kdm
problem is the KDE one will probably affect KDM
ah, that is why
but I use GDM so I need it : )
yeah thats why...hang on see if i can help

you should be able to restore what you need on the menu?
